title: mendace
author: mendace
content: Attention all graphic designers! I am looking for a talented individual to design a logo for my business. The payment will be made in Bitcoin. If you are passionate about creating visually stunning designs and are familiar with the cryptocurrency world, then this opportunity is for you.Please quote this messagge if you are interested.

comments.author: Little Mouse
comments.body: Jayce without any doubt- https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=335088I have worked with him so many times and was never disappointed. His pricing is a bit more standard than others but as they say quality doesn't come with low effort. Vouching for him.Move the topic into the Service board to get better responses. You won't get a response here because this board is all about announcing the services, specially mixer
